lead_paragraph: MOSER--James G. October 30, 1952- May 31, 2006 God Bless you on your 10th anniversary in heaven. We miss your hearty laughter and eloquent manner. Your kindness and generosity will remain. James grew up as a Christian at Berean Baptist Church. He graduated from Brown University and became an Editor. He was God's precious gift to all. Love, Mom, Gwen, Karen & family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  MOSER, JAMES G

snippet: MOSER--James G. October 30, 1952- May 31, 2006 God Bless you on your 10th anniversary in heaven. We miss your hearty laughter and eloquent manner. Your kindness and generosity will remain. James grew up as a Christian at Berean Baptist Church. He graduated from Brown University and became an Editor. He was God's precious gift to all. Love, Mom, Gwen, Karen & family. 1/3
